headline.main: U.S.-MADE BOMBERS TO PATROL PACIFIC; Huge Flying Boats Are Being Transferred in Hawaii to Crews of Britons WILL SAFEGUARD SHIPPING Some Planes for Singapore Have Crossed the Atlantic, Going the Long Way

lead_paragraph: HONOLULU, Feb. 2 -- Somebody should put up signs on all South Pacific islands for the benefit of passing Nazi commerce raiders warning them to "high-tail it" to safer waters.
abstract: Consol bomber deliveries by air to Brit Pacific areas reptd
snippet: HONOLULU, Feb. 2 -- Somebody should put up signs on all South Pacific islands for the benefit of passing Nazi commerce raiders warning them to "high-tail it" to safer waters....

byline.original: By ROYAL ARCH GUNNISONNorth American Newspaper Alliance
